sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
A Flow Designer Action that can send REST API calls dynamically using just a few inputs, without needing to predefine REST Messages.
Developers or flow designers can just plug it into a Flow and call any API instantly.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Dynamic Integration Trigger
